Articles.Content:
You are in a really, really, really tall building. You must ascend to the top. Problem is, there are a LOT of floors to ascend, and there are NO ELEVATORS...

The game progresses like this:

Player 1: Floor 227, you see Jebediah Kerman riding an SRB.

Player 2: Floor 228, you get into a battle with Hulk Hogan.

Player 3: Floor 229, you stop for lunch at the Subway.

etc...

Rules:

1.All normal rules apply

2.One floor at a time

3.One sentence per floor.

4.You can only go up, never down.

Begin!

Ground floor, you see the huge stairway.

Edited July 5 by Gargamel
Temp lock
Floor 1, You see the shops and such

This seems extremley familiar... yup this already exists, but whatver.

Floor 2: You crash through a trapdoor into floor into floor -5- wait.

Oh this is different. You only go up.

Oh well, let me retry.

You suddenly find a magic elevator, and get in- however it suddenly transformers, you get out, and quickly grab on Jebediahs SRB booster to go up, but then you let go at floor 2.

Floor 3:

You see some crazy guy looping around a receptionist. You keep walking at a fast, yet unnoticeable frantic run.
Floor 4 you pop into the R&D department and find kerbals messing around with SRB's
Floor 5 Welcome to Moe's!
Floor 6: You see an AT-ST walker coming straight toward you, and walk a little faster.
Floor 7 You meet your new fairy overlords.
Floor 8: You drop dead and then are revived by the receptionist from floor 3 (she was going to the bathroom on floor 9).
Floor 9: Bathroom Central
Floor 10:A giant cider machine oh the cider is amazing ,and free.go drink some.
Floor 11. Bathrooms, as far as the eye can see. 3 of them must be flushed before you can progress. Which 3? Who knows!

People seem to forget the one sentance rule...

Floor 12: You see Catbug, and go over to see him, but he turns into a demon and chases you away to floor 13.
Floor 13: You relise this is who everyone on the internet is.
Floor 14: You don't see this floor, because you are quickly running to floor 15 after going mad from the revelation on floor 13.
Floor 15: There's a sign saying Welcome to floor 16, you're confused.
Floor 16: Jeb flies his SRB through the building picking you up. You fall and land on floor 17.
Floor 17: Home of the GOLDEN DONUTS OF HOLY POWER!

Floor 18: You find a large empty room with a note on the floor, it reads "Get me a soda, I am at floor 20. Thanks!".

Edited June 28, 2013 by Rockcoole
Floor 19: Convenient vending machines as far as the eye can see; you buy one. (hey, it's technically one sentence! bad grammar, but one sentence! )
Floor 20 - There is a giant Siamese cat, who takes the soda and sends you on your way.
Floor 21: On the 21st floor you see Waluigi and his time.
Floor 22: There's a card lying on the floor: Go directly to Jail. Do not pass GO, do not collect $200.
Floor 23: Jail
Floor 24: M.A.C controls
